resources.string: Show information about the app, like how to create/delete a playlist, add/remove a song from it.
User will be able to make app configurations like retrieve music files from cloud or locally.
It\'will show all Albums. On click on arrow icon, the related songs list will be opened
It\'will show all Artists. On click on arrow icon, the related songs list will be opened
It\'will show all Genres. On click on arrow icon, the related songs list will be opened
It\'will show all Playlists. On click on arrow icon, the related songs list will be opened
Audio player will play the selected song using Media Player library
Show related songs based on selected artist/album/genre/playlist
It\'will show all device \'s songs or a message that no songs are available. On click on play icon, the music play will be opened
